DOC.brief_summary: the purpose of this study is to analyzes the factors influencing the results of cuff leak test, in order to improve the cuff leak test on the accuracy of the prediction on airway edema after extubation.
DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Factors and the Results of the Cuff Leak Test
DOC.criteria: Intubation less than 24 hours before amitting respiratory intensive care unit; unstable hemodynamics;PEEP≥10cmH2O or FiO2≥0.8
